descriptions.value: DNSSEC validation is not performed correctly. An attacker can cause this package to report successful validation for invalid, attacker-controlled records.  The owner name of RRSIG RRs is not validated, permitting an attacker to present the RRSIG for an attacker-controlled domain in a response for any other domain.

descriptions.description: CWE 347: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature
